intro: Stephania lincangensis, commonly known as the Lincang stephania, is a flowering plant species native to China. It belongs to the family Menispermaceae and is characterized by its climbing habit and compound leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are followed by berries containing seeds. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
